#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	char s[15];
	while(t--){
		scanf("%s",s);
		int len=strlen(s);
		int j=len-1,count=0;
		for (int i = 0; i < len/2; ++i)
		{
			if(s[i]==s[j])
				count++;
			--j;

		}
		if(count==len/2)
			printf("YES\n");
		else
			printf("NO\n");
	}
}
